title: (x) NewOrder - (similar to) Alternate Gothic (slanted) & Trade Gothic Ext {Mark S}
content:
Sorry if this has been asked -- but I couldn't get any results when I did a search (perhaps the Search feature dislikes me).   
   
 ![NewOrder Story](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052229im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/26657.gif)   
 ![Blue Monday 1988](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052229im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/26658.gif)
author: toketsu

comments.content:
The top one is Alternate Gothic (No. 1, I think), slanted.   
   
The other one looks like [Trade Gothic Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052229/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/lh-extended/testdrive.html?s=NEW&p=48) and [Bold Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052229/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/lh-bold-extended/testdrive.html?s=ORDER&p=48).
Hmm. Not so sure about the first one now. It could be No. 2 or No. 3 condensed somewhat, but I don't know.
Hmm, apparently the bottom is "Chisel Wide", and the top is "Eng Gothic Italic", I've never heard of these fonts before, though, so yeah, I'll go with the ones you posted, thanks.
